resources.string: Experimental features may be unstable, so if something goes wrong, turn off the corresponding feature
Activate index checking when transferring data
Once activated, the data is not retransmitted if it already exists on the device.
Once activated, GCode data will be regenerated instead of being modified on the original GCode data.
When activated, when the vector graphics to GCode algorithm is converted, G2/G3 instructions will be output, otherwise only G0/G1 instructions will be used.
Activate elements to be sculpted sequentially from top to bottom
When activated, the elements are engraved in order from top to bottom according to the coordinates, otherwise they are engraved in the prescribed layer order.
Information rendering when sculpting is activated
When activated, the engraving number, progress, and corresponding border of the corresponding element will be rendered during engraving.
Activate the Single Element Engraving parameter
after activation, the engraving parameters of each element can be set separately in the layer.
after activation, the engraving method will be changed to engraving one element at a time once it is transferred.
Preview when activating and Engraving again
After activation, click the Engraving Again button in the engraving completion interface to trigger the preview command.
